welcome.title: PROFESSIONAL FITNESS & BODYBUILDING CONSULTATION QUESTIONNAIRE
welcome.description: Designed for all levels: beginners to stage athletes

section1.title: SECTION 1 â€” PERSONAL & BASIC INFORMATION
section1.description: Let's start with some basic information about you.

section2.title: SECTION 2 â€” HEALTH HISTORY
section2.description: Let's learn about your health and medical history.

section3.title: SECTION 3 â€” TRAINING HISTORY & EXPERIENCE
section3.description: Tell us about your training experience.

section4.title: SECTION 4 â€” GOALS & PHYSIQUE PRIORITIES
section4.description: Let's understand your fitness goals and priorities.

section5.title: SECTION 5 â€” TRAINING STYLE, LIMITATIONS & BIOFEEDBACK
section5.description: Tell us about your training preferences and limitations.

section6.title: SECTION 6 â€” CARDIO, MOBILITY & CONDITIONING
section6.description: Let's discuss your cardiovascular training and mobility.

section7.title: SECTION 7 â€” LIFESTYLE, ADHERENCE & MINDSET
section7.description: Tell us about your lifestyle and mindset.

section8.title: SECTION 8 â€” PHOTOS & PROGRESS TRACKING
section8.description: How do you track your progress?

section10.title: SECTION 10 â€” HYDRATION
section10.description: Tell us about your hydration habits.

section11.title: SECTION 11 â€” AAP (ACTIVATION AND PAIN PATTERNS)
section11.description: Understanding your muscle activation and pain patterns.

questions.email: Please provide your email to receive your personalized plan
questions.profissao: Occupation and work routine (shift work, sedentary, active job, etc.):
questions.horario_sono: Usual sleep schedule (bedtime and wake time):
questions.horas_sono: Average hours of sleep per night:
questions.tipo_sono: How would you rate your sleep?
questions.acorda_descansado: Do you wake up feeling rested?
questions.energia_dia: How would you describe your daily energy levels?
questions.gestante: Are you pregnant or trying to conceive? (if applicable)
questions.doencas: Do you have any diagnosed medical conditions? (e.g. hypothyroidism, PCOS, insulin resistance)
questions.lesoes: Have you ever suffered any injuries? Please specify location and year:
questions.cirurgias: Have you had any surgeries? Which ones and when?
questions.medicacao: Do you take any medications regularly? Which ones?
questions.alergias: Do you have any food allergies or intolerances?
questions.anticoncepcional: Do you use birth control? Specify type and method:
questions.exames_sangue: Have you had blood work done in the last 6 months?
questions.exames_alteracoes: If yes, were there any abnormalities?
questions.tempo_treino: How long have you been training consistently?
questions.fases_cutting_bulking: Have you ever done cutting or bulking phases? How many times?
questions.coach_anterior: Have you had professional coaching before?
questions.tipo_treino_atual: What type of training do you currently do?
questions.dias_por_semana: How many days per week can you commit to training?
questions.tempo_disponivel_sessao: How much time do you have available per session?
questions.limitacoes_equipamento: Do you have any equipment limitations?
questions.objetivo_secundario: Do you have a secondary goal?
questions.competir: Are you planning to compete? If yes, in which category and federation?
questions.prazo_objetivo: Do you have a deadline to achieve your goal?
questions.dieta_rigida: Are you willing to follow a strict diet if necessary?
questions.estrategias_avancadas: Are you open to advanced strategies (depletion, carb-loading, intermittent fasting)?
questions.grupos_musculares_enfase: Which muscle groups would you like to emphasize?
questions.grupos_musculares_dificeis: Which muscle groups are hardest to activate or develop?
questions.uso_anabolicos: Have you ever used anabolic substances? If yes, which ones and for how long?
questions.estrategia_farmacologica: Are you planning or currently following a pharmacological strategy under medical guidance?
questions.exercicios_gosta: Which exercises do you enjoy most and why?
questions.exercicios_nao_gosta: Which exercises do you dislike or avoid and why?
questions.exercicios_nao_pode: Are there exercises you cannot perform due to injury or limitation?
questions.melhor_estilo_treino: What training style works best for you?
questions.dificuldade_ativar: Do you struggle to activate specific muscle groups? Which ones?
questions.grupos_respondem_rapido: Which muscle groups respond fastest to training?
questions.dor_articular: Do you experience joint pain? Where and how often?
questions.como_se_sente_pos_treino: How do you feel after training?
questions.dificuldade_seguir_plano: Do you have difficulty following a workout plan on your own?
questions.preferencia_variacao: Do you prefer variation or structured progression?
questions.resistencia_cardiovascular: How would you rate your cardiovascular endurance?
questions.experiencia_hiit: Do you have experience with HIIT? Do you enjoy it or feel unwell?
questions.cardio_jejum: Are you open to doing fasted cardio?
questions.limitacoes_respiratorias: Do you have any respiratory or cardiovascular limitations?
questions.mobilidade_alongamento: Do you have a mobility or stretching routine?
questions.dias_faceis_dificeis: Which days are easiest/most difficult to train?
questions.maior_desafio_consistencia: What is your biggest challenge in staying consistent?
questions.apoio_familia: Do you have support from family/friends for your fitness goals?
questions.o_que_desanima: What discourages you or makes you want to give up on fitness plans?
questions.nivel_comprometimento: On a scale of 0-10, how committed are you to achieving your goals?
questions.enviar_fotos: Are you open to sending progress photos periodically?
questions.tem_fotos: Do you have before/after photos from previous transformations?
questions.frequencia_checkin: How often would you like check-ins and adjustments?
questions.usar_apps: Do you like using apps to track your workouts or meals?
questions.plano_alimentar_atual: Are you currently following a meal plan? If yes, who created it?
questions.suplementos_atuais: Which supplements do you currently use? (brand and dosage)
questions.ajustar_dieta: Are you willing to adjust your diet based on training demands?
questions.preparar_refeicoes: Is it easy for you to prepare your own meals?
questions.agua_por_dia: How much water do you consume per day (in liters)?
questions.rastreia_agua: Do you track your water intake?
questions.sede_durante_dia: Do you feel thirsty during the day or workouts?
questions.eletrolitros: Do you add electrolytes or hydration supplements to your water?
questions.sentir_musculo_trabalhando: Do you feel the target muscle working during exercises? Or do you struggle with mind-muscle connection?
questions.dor_muscular_pos_treino: Do you experience muscle soreness (DOMS) after workouts? Which muscles?
questions.dor_articulacoes_treino: Do you experience joint pain during training? Where?
questions.informacoes_adicionais: Is there any additional information you consider important that wasn't covered in this form?

experiencia_hiit: I tolerate but feel very tired

thankYou.title: Thank you for completing the questionnaire!
thankYou.description: Dr. Jackie will review your answers and create your personalized fitness plan.

verification.verifyHuman: Please verify you are human to continue

submission.successTitle: âœ… Success! Your fitness assessment has been submitted
submission.successMessage:
Thank you! Dr. Jackie has received your detailed assessment and will personally review all your responses.

You should receive a confirmation email at the address you provided shortly.

Dr. Jackie will analyze your information and create a customized training and nutrition plan tailored specifically to your goals, experience level, and lifestyle.

Expect to hear back within 24-48 hours with your personalized program and next steps.

Thank you for trusting Dr. Jackie's expertise. Your transformation journey starts now! ðŸ’ª
submission.errorMessage: There was an error submitting your form. Please try again.
submission.step1: Your assessment has been sent directly to Dr. Jackie, who will review it personally.
submission.step2: She will create your personalized fitness plan based on your responses.
submission.step3: Dr. Jackie will respond shortly with your plan and next steps.
submission.thankYouTitle: Thank you for trusting Dr. Jackie's work!
submission.thankYouDescription: Your journey to better fitness starts here. We're excited to help you achieve your goals!
